title: Mazinger Z
creator: Go Nagai
description: The foundational anime that established the super robot genre. It introduced the concept of a pilot controlling a giant robot from a cockpit inside its head.

title: Getter Robo
creator: Go Nagai, Ken Ishikawa
description: Pioneered the concept of combining and transforming mecha, with three vehicles piloted by different characters that could form three different robot configurations.

title: The King of Braves GaoGaiGar
creator: Sunrise
description: A classic '90s series that served as a tribute to the super robot genre, featuring bombastic, heroic action and an elaborate combining robot.

title: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
creator: Hiroyuki Imaishi, Kazuki Nakashima
description: A popular modern super robot series known for its over-the-top, escalating scale, where mecha and battles grow to impossible, galaxy-sized proportions.

title: SSSS.Gridman
creator: Tsuburaya Productions, Trigger
description: A unique entry that blends the super robot genre with the Japanese 'tokusatsu' style of giant monster battles, featuring a robot hero who fights kaiju.

title: Brave Bang Bravern!
creator: Masami Obari
description: A recent anime that's a love letter to the classic super robot genre, with a self-aware and humorous take on its tropes and traditions.
